Title: Provides for congestion pricing for motorcycles in the central business district
Summary: Authorizes the Triborough bridge and tunnel authority to impose tolls and fees for congestion pricing for motorcycles in the central business district in the amount of half of the charges for the tolls and fees of other vehicles.
LawCode: Amd ยง1704-a, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to the central business district toll and congestion pricing in New York city
